name: New Generations Story Sets
description: A comprehensive collection of scripture sets for evangelism, discipleship, and leadership development

root.label: Scripture Set #3 – A Sample Set For Developing Leaders
root.description: Leadership development through the book of Titus

root.label: Scripture Set #4 – Various issues of Mission & Contextualization
root.description: Advanced topics for mission and cultural adaptation
